entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 08:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -31.4°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
